com.omerozer.knit.schedulers.heavy

Class TaskPackage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.omerozer.knit.schedulers.heavy.TaskPackage

  • public class TaskPackage
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains everything that a HeavyThread needs to perform a task.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.concurrent.Callable callable
      Callable that contains the task and generates a result.
      private Consumer consumer
      Consumer class that will handle the result of the task.
      private SchedulerInterface current
      SchedulerInterface that is sending this package
      static TaskPackage EMPTY
      Constant TaskPackage for empty tasks.
      private java.lang.Runnable runnable
      Runnable that contains the task.
      private SchedulerInterface target
      SchedulerInterface that is going to handle consumer task once the current task is complete.

      Constructor and Description
      TaskPackage()

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.concurrent.Callable getCallable()
      Return the callable task that generates the data for the Consumer .
      Consumer getConsumer()
      Returns the Consumer object that will handle the consume flow.
      SchedulerInterface getCurrent()
      Returns the scheduler instance that this task is coming from.
      java.lang.Runnable getRunnable()
      Returns the runnable task that is being sent.
      SchedulerInterface getTarget()
      Returns the target SchedulerInterface that will run the consume part of the task.

      Set the Consumer object that will handle the consume flow.
